Generation VII.Sun: It is said to live in another world. The intense light it radiates from the surface of its body can make the darkest of nights light up like midday.
Generation VII.Moon: This Pokémon is said to be a male evolution of Cosmog . At the activation of its third eye, it departs for another world.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: Sometimes the result of its opening an Ultra Wormhole is that energy and life-forms from other worlds are called here to this world.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: In writings from the distant past, it's called by the name “the beast that devours the sun.”

Generation VIII.Sword: When light radiates from its body, this Pokémon could almost appear to be the sun. It will dispel any darkness and light up the world. *
Generation VIII.Shield: Solgaleo was once known as the Beast That Devours the Sun. Energy in the form of light radiates boundlessly from it. *

Generation VII.Sun: Altar of the Sunne ( Only one )

Generation VIII.Sword Expansion Pass: Max Lair ( Dynamax Adventure ) ( Only one )

Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Scarle: Pokémon League after receiving the Solgaleo Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Solo Quest )
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero (Violet: Pokémon League after receiving the Solgaleo Treat from Snacksworth ( Only one ) ( Group Quest )
